start_sources()
# -- cryphysics.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

if (PHYSICS_PHYSX)

	link_directories( "${SDK_DIR}/PhysX/SDK/Lib/vc14win64" )
	link_directories( "${SDK_DIR}/PhysX/Shared/Lib/vc14win64" )
	# if (MSVC_VERSION EQUAL 1900)     # Visual Studio 2015
		# link_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/PhysX-3.3/PhysXSDK/Lib/vc14win64 )
	# elseif (MSVC_VERSION EQUAL 1800) # Visual Studio 2013
		# link_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/PhysX-3.3/PhysXSDK/Lib/vc12win64 )
	# elseif (MSVC_VERSION EQUAL 1700) # Visual Studio 2012
		# link_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/PhysX-3.3/PhysXSDK/Lib/vc11win64 )
	# endif()


	CryEngineModule(CryPhysX PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine")
	target_include_directories( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${SDK_DIR}/PhysX/SDK/Include" )
	target_include_directories( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${SDK_DIR}/PhysX/Shared/Include" )

else()
	CryFileContainer(CryPhysX SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine")
endif()
